const Triangle = ({color, size, children}) => {

        height: size,

          position: 'absolute',
          width: '100%',
          height: '100%',
          borderTopRightRadius: 30,
          backgroundColor: color,
          transform: [{rotate: '-60deg'}, {skewX: '-30deg'}, {scaleY: 0.866}],

      />
      {/* Lower Triangle */}
      <View
        style={ {
          position: 'absolute',
          width: '100%',
          height: '100%',
          borderTopRightRadius: 30,
          backgroundColor: color,
          transform: [
            {rotate: '-180deg'},
            {skewX: '-30deg'},
            {scaleY: 0.866},

          ],
        } }
      />
      {/* Bottom Right Triangle */}
      <View
        style={ {
          position: 'absolute',
          width: '100%',
          height: '100%',
          borderTopLeftRadius: 30,
          backgroundColor: color,
          transform: [
            {rotate: '180deg'},
            {skewX: '30deg'},
            {scaleY: 0.866},
            {translateY: -0.5 * size},
          ],
        } }
      />
      {children}
    </View>
  );
};
